test-case.name: enclosing-001
test-case.description: Purpose: test a simple enclosing mode.

test-case.name: enclosing-002
test-case.description: Purpose: test an enclosing mode with xsl:next-match.

test-case.name: enclosing-003
test-case.description: Purpose: call out to another enclosed mode, and then back in.

test-case.name: enclosing-004
test-case.description: Purpose: enclosing mode doesn't participate in mode="#all".

test-case.name: enclosing-901
test-case.description: [ERR XTSE4005] It is a static error if an xsl:mode declaration with one or more xsl:template children has no name attribute.

test-case.name: enclosing-902
test-case.description: [ERR XTSE4010] It is a static error if an xsl:mode declaration has a child xsl:template element with a name attribute....

test-case.name: enclosing-903
test-case.description: [ERR XTSE4010] It is a static error if an xsl:mode declaration has a child xsl:template element with a ... a mode attribute ....

test-case.name: enclosing-904
test-case.description: [ERR XTSE4010] It is a static error if an xsl:mode declaration has a child xsl:template element with ... no match attribute.

test-case.name: enclosing-905
test-case.description: [ERR XTSE4015] It is a static error if an xsl:mode declaration having one or more child xsl:template elements has a default-mode attribute whose value differs from its name attribute,...

test-case.name: enclosing-906
test-case.description: [ERR XTSE4015] It is a static error if an xsl:mode declaration having one or more child xsl:template elements has ..., or if any of those child xsl:template elements has a default-mode attribute that differs from the name attribute of the xsl:mode declaration.

test-case.name: enclosing-907
test-case.description: [ERR XTSE4020] It is a static error if a package contains both (a) an xsl:mode declaration having one or more child xsl:template elements, and (b) an xsl:template declaration that is not one of those children but that references the xsl:mode declaration in its mode attribute

test-case.name: enclosing-908
test-case.description: [ERR XTSE4025] It is a static error if a package contains (a) an xsl:mode declaration having one or more child xsl:template elements, and (b) a second xsl:mode declaration having the same name and the same import precedence.

test-case.name: enclosing-909
test-case.description: [ERR XTSE4025] It is a static error if a package contains (a) an xsl:mode declaration having one or more child xsl:template elements, and (b) a second xsl:mode declaration having the same name and the same import precedence.

test-case.name: enclosing-910
test-case.description: [ERR XTSE4025] It is a static error if a package contains (a) an xsl:mode declaration having one or more child xsl:template elements, and (b) a second xsl:mode declaration having the same name and the same import precedence.
